statements: SELECT id, mediator_name, case_id, success_rate, case_duration FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT mediator_name, case_id, success_rate, case_duration, id FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT case_id, id, success_rate, mediator_name, case_duration FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT id, case_duration, case_id, success_rate, mediator_name FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT * FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT * FROM mediation_reports WHERE success_rate > 0.75 ORDER BY case_duration DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, success_rate, case_duration FROM mediation_reports WHERE case_id = 100 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(success_rate) AS average_success_rate, MAX(case_duration) AS max_case_duration FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT mediator_name, success_rate, case_duration FROM mediation_reports WHERE case_duration BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, AVG(success_rate) AS average_success_rate FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT * FROM mediation_success_rates;
SELECT case_id, success_rate FROM mediation_success_rates WHERE success_rate > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM case_durations ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT case_id, MAX(duration_minutes) AS max_duration FROM case_durations GROUP BY case_id;
SELECT id, case_id, AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate FROM mediation_success_rates GROUP BY id, case_id;
SELECT * FROM mediation_success_rates WHERE success_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT case_id, AVG(duration_minutes) AS average_duration FROM case_durations GROUP BY case_id HAVING AVG(duration_minutes) > 30;
SELECT MAX(success_rate) AS max_success_rate, MIN(success_rate) AS min_success_rate FROM mediation_success_rates;
SELECT case_id, duration_minutes FROM case_durations WHERE duration_minutes BETWEEN 60 AND 120 ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC, case_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT case_id FROM case_durations ORDER BY case_id;
SELECT * FROM MediationSuccessRates WHERE success_rate > 80;
SELECT mediator_name, success_rate FROM MediationSuccessRates ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT report_date, report_content FROM ReportData WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT case_number, start_date, end_date, duration FROM CaseDurations WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT id, mediator_name, success_rate FROM MediationSuccessRates JOIN CaseDurations ON MediationSuccessRates.id = CaseDurations.id;
SELECT * FROM MediationSuccessRates WHERE success_rate > 80 ORDER BY mediator_name DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, success_rate FROM MediationSuccessRates WHERE success_rate < 50 ORDER BY success_rate;
SELECT case_number, duration FROM CaseDurations WHERE duration >= 30 ORDER BY duration DESC, case_number;
SELECT report_date, report_content FROM ReportData WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediationSuccessRates JOIN CaseDurations ON MediationSuccessRates.id = CaseDurations.id ORDER BY mediator_name, case_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_reports;
SELECT report_id, mediator_id, success_rate FROM mediation_reports WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM cases WHERE case_type = 'Divorce' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_email FROM mediators ORDER BY mediator_name DESC;
SELECT case_id, start_time, end_time FROM case_durations WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_reports WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_email FROM mediators ORDER BY mediator_name ASC;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type FROM cases WHERE case_type = 'Divorce';
SELECT report_id, mediator_id, case_id, duration_minutes FROM mediation_reports WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT case_id, start_time, end_time FROM case_durations WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT * FROM mediation_centers;
SELECT center_name, city FROM mediation_centers;
SELECT * FROM mediators ORDER BY center_id DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, center_id FROM mediators WHERE center_id = 2;
SELECT case_name, mediation_date FROM cases WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM mediators WHERE center_id = 1 ORDER BY mediator_name DESC;
SELECT case_name, mediation_date FROM cases WHERE mediator_id = 3 AND mediation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT party_name, case_name FROM case_parties JOIN cases ON case_parties.case_id = cases.case_id WHERE party_id = 2 ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT center_name, city FROM mediation_centers WHERE center_id = 2;
SELECT SUM(success_rate) AS total_success_rate, AVG(case_duration) AS avg_duration FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE case_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT case_id FROM case_parties WHERE party_id = 1);
